description: This group web app, Umich Study Spaces Explorer, was built by Team: Victoria Maglaras coordinated meetings, communication; Joshua Peoples and Audrey Lui basically analyzed the student survey and conducted field observations of study spaces; Dapeng Wang acted as scribe/communications lead and implemented the backend database, API, and reservation integration; and I (Xinyue “Alice” Xu) wrote the initial project proposal, designed the overall project plan, the 5-dimension evaluation framework and user questionnaire, and built the React frontend interface and account setup.
reflections: I drafted our project proposal, designed the 5-dimension evaluation framework, and built the frontend interface and account system, which taught me how to translate user research into a focused, production-ready web experience.
